name: Jett Tailfin
overview: Follow Jett Tailfin and his best friends as they compete in underwater races full of enemies and obstacles! Speed through exciting environments like Atlantis, Ship Graveyard, Pirates Island, and more. But watch out for sharks, jellyfish, stingrays and other creatures that will try to prevent you from finishing in 1st place! Escape natural enemies like sharks, rays, and jellyfish. Challenge up to 8 different friends in multiplayer mode. Unlock bonus mini-ventures as you progress. Pick up friends along the way like the electric eel, blowfish, and octopus, and use them as weapons against your opponents!
